sections.heading: Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice, defined
sections.text: Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice means the standards adopted and promulgated by The Appraisal Foundation as the standards existed on January 1, 2024.SourceLaws 2001, LB 162, ยง 11;R.S.1943, (2003), ยง 76-2218.01;Laws 2006, LB 77
